posts.text:
Danni er sem stendur í 27 sæti overall í WRC GB sem stendur eftir 3 leiðar.....

Hægt er að fylgjast með tímunum Live hér....

http://www.wrc.com/jsp/index.jsp?lnk...egory=&stage=3

Danni ekkert að spara það.......


Eftir SS3 

68: Rene Kuipers/Erwin Mombaerts 
“I am taking it easy and my son is two cars ahead of me. It used to be the other way around!” 

70: Daniel Siguroarson/Andrew Sankey 
“We were held up by a car in front and he smashed my screen. I am absolutely furious.” 

71: Eamonn Boland/MJ Morrissey 
“Slippy but great stage. It is good to be back in Wales again.” 

73: Egon Kaur/Erik Lepikson 
“Great stages, really happy but am struggling with my pacenotes. I will try and do better on the next run.” 

72: Wug Utting/Max Utting 
“We hit a bank with the back end and got a puncture. We lose maybe thirty seconds.”

Dagurinn búinn hjá þeim köppum, vonandi að hann jafni sig fyrir morgun daginn

http://www.hipporace.blog.is/blog/hipporace/
Ofboðslega leiðinlegt að heyra eftir geðveikan akstur hjá Danna í dag <<<icon_sad.gif>>>
